trans-unit.source:
\n

Lets you efficiently bulk load a SQL Server table with data from another source.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxx xxxx x XXX Xxxxxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
At the end of each batch, the rows in the batch are sent to the server.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx xxx xx xxxx xxxxx$ xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Number of seconds for the operation to complete before it times out.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
By default, it is an empty collection.

\n
trans-unit.target: Xx xxxxxxx$ xx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Name of the destination table on the server.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Defines the number of rows to be processed before generating a notification event.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx x xxxxxxxxxxxx xxxxx.$$x$$x
